description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF REAR ROOF EXTENSION;3 FRONT ROOFLIGHTS AND FOR THE ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION (FOLLOWING DETERMINATION THAT PRIOR APPROVAL IS NOT REQUIRED FOR THE EXTENSION UNDER APPLICATION REFERENCE 19/P2286)
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations, pertaining to the proposed single storey rear extension, would consist of an enlargement of a dwelling within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 and would exceed the development tolerances set out in Class A.1(f) (i).  but would meet the thresholds set out in A.1 (g) (i) (ii) of the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (Amendment)(England) Order 2015. The development comprising a single-storey rear extension is therefore "permitted" provided it is constructed in accordance with the details of the application LBM reference 19/P2286 and the conditions set out in that decision are applicable.

Condition : 2 - The operations, pertaining to the proposed rear roof extension, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations, pertaining to the front rooflights, would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
